name: Invitation From Miko
desc: Miko has sent you a long-awaited letter. It seems she has something important she wants to discuss...

desc.text:
I haven't seen or heard from you in quite some time, little one. Don't tell me you've forgotten all about your Lady Yae Miko, and gone off and found yourself a new shrine maiden somewhere else?
That wouldn't do at all â€” for one thing, it would break my poor little heart. But surely, a kind and gentle soul such as you couldn't bear to see me that way, would you?
Tell you what, let's meet at Tenshukaku. I've already had a word with the Okuzumeshuu at the entrance to let you in, so don't even think about turning me down.
Relax, you're not in trouble. In fact, you're in for quite a treat. Hehe...

value.text: Version 5.4 Event - Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival
